name: LottieViewConvert
description: A powerful cross-platform desktop application for converting TGS (Telegram Stickers), Discord animmated stickers and Lottie animations to various formats including GIF, WebP, APNG, MP4, MKV, AVIF, and WebM. Support download telegram sticker from sticker link. 电报、Discord、Lottie动画转换工具，支持 Gif、WebP、APNG、MP4 等常见格式，支持直接下载电报、Discord贴纸包。
readme_summary: LottieViewConvert is a cross-platform desktop application designed to convert Lottie and TGS (Telegram/Discord sticker) animations into various popular formats like GIF, WebP, APNG, MP4, and more. It also supports downloading sticker sets directly from Telegram and Discord.
key_features: Multiple Format Support (GIF, WebP, APNG, MP4, MKV, AVIF, WebM)
primary_use_case: Converting Lottie and Telegram/Discord sticker animations to various image and video formats, with integrated sticker downloading capabilities.
cover_image_prompt: A digital alchemist's workshop where animated scrolls (representing Lottie/TGS files) are fed into a glowing, intricate machine. The machine, labeled 'LottieViewConvert', transforms these scrolls into a cascade of vibrant output formats: a shimmering GIF butterfly, a smooth WebP wave, a crisp APNG bird, and a dynamic MP4 scene. Small, stylized icons of Telegram and Discord bots are seen handing over new scrolls to the workshop. The overall mood is one of creative transformation and digital artistry, with subtle UI elements and data streams flowing around the central machine. 3D isometric illustration style, clean lines, vibrant color palette, high detail.

name: termdash
readme_summary: Termdash is a Go library for creating cross-platform, customizable terminal-based dashboards. It provides a flexible framework for building interactive UIs within the terminal, supporting dynamic layouts, event handling, and a variety of widgets.
key_features: Full support for terminal window resizing
Customizable layout, widget placement, borders, margins, padding, colors
Binary tree and Grid forms of setting up the layout
Processing of keyboard and mouse events
Periodic and event driven screen redraw
UTF-8 support for all text elements
primary_use_case: Building interactive and customizable dashboards or UIs directly within the terminal environment using Go.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect meticulously designing and constructing a vibrant, multi-level city skyline using only colorful building blocks and blueprints within the confines of a large, glowing terminal window. Each block represents a different widget or UI element, and the architect's tools are subtle code snippets. The city skyline should visually represent a dynamic dashboard with interconnected components. The overall mood is one of creative construction and organized complexity, with subtle digital particles flowing from the blueprints. The style should be a clean, 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clear forms and a modern color palette, emphasizing the 'dashboard in terminal' concept.

name: VidBee
description: Download videos from almost any website worldwide
readme_summary: VidBee is an open-source video downloader application built with Electron and powered by yt-dlp. It allows users to download videos and audio from over 1000 websites worldwide through an intuitive graphical interface and also offers a browser script for quick downloads.
key_features: Download videos and audios from 1000+ websites
Built with Electron for a modern desktop experience
Powered by yt-dlp for robust downloading capabilities
Browser script for quick download buttons on websites
primary_use_case: Downloading videos and audio content from a wide variety of online platforms.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, stylized robot holding a universal remote control, pointing it at a swirling vortex of digital content streams (representing various websites like YouTube, TikTok, Twitter). From the vortex, individual video files are neatly materializing and being collected into a digital basket labeled 'VidBee'. Subtle glowing lines connect the robot's remote to the vortex, indicating control. Small, transparent screens around the scene show simplified download progress bars and icons of popular social media platforms. The overall mood is helpful and efficient, with a clean, bright color palette. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with soft shadows and clear, friendly character design.

name: silence
description: Simple WinUI app to mute your mic on global level (for all apps). Sounds, overlay and customization included!
readme_summary: Silence! is a lightweight Windows utility that provides global microphone muting functionality. It allows users to quickly mute or unmute their microphone using customizable hotkeys and offers a system tray icon for visual feedback and quick toggling. The application features a modern UI and can optionally start with Windows.
key_features: System tray icon with color-coded mute status
Quick toggle via system tray click
primary_use_case: Globally muting and unmuting the microphone on Windows systems with a customizable hotkey for quick access during calls or other activities.
cover_image_prompt: A 3D isometric illustration of a modern, minimalist desk setup. In the center, a stylized microphone is depicted with a clear, glowing red 'mute' symbol hovering above it, signifying it's silenced. A subtle, translucent overlay graphic emanates from the microphone, indicating its global effect across unseen applications. On the side, a small, clean UI element resembling a system tray icon shows a red circle. The overall mood is one of quiet control and efficiency, with soft, ambient lighting. The 'silence!' app name is subtly integrated into the design of the UI element. The style should be clean, modern, and easily understandable, focusing on the core function of instant, global microphone silencing.

name: awesome-web-scraping
description: List of libraries, tools and APIs for web scraping and data processing.
readme_summary: This repository is a curated list of resources for web scraping, including libraries, tools, and APIs across various programming languages like Python, PHP, Ruby, JavaScript, and Go. It also provides links to manuals, headless browser lists, and related services such as captcha solving and proxy marketplaces.
key_features: Curated lists of web scraping libraries and tools
Categorization by programming language (Python, PHP, Ruby, JavaScript, Go)
Resources for web scraping manuals and books
Links to DNS over HTTPS providers
primary_use_case: To serve as a comprehensive, organized directory of resources for individuals and developers interested in performing web scraping and data processing.
cover_image_prompt: A digital librarian meticulously organizing a vast library of glowing data streams, each stream representing a different website. The librarian uses a magnifying glass to examine the streams, sorting them into labeled shelves categorized by programming languages like Python, PHP, and JavaScript. Small, ethereal bots are seen efficiently collecting data from these streams. In the background, a subtle interface displays a world map with data points being collected. The overall mood is one of organized knowledge discovery. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a clean, futuristic aesthetic and a vibrant color palette.

name: scam-max-disabler
description: Позволяет убедительно показать, что Max «не работает» на вашем устройстве в ситуациях, когда требуют его установку
readme_summary: This Android application allows users to convincingly simulate that the 'MAX' application is not working on their device, or to completely block its installation. It operates without root access and offers two distinct modes: active blocking and installation blocking.
key_features: Simulates MAX application crashes on launch without uninstalling.
Prevents installation of the MAX application.
Allows masking the application's name and icon.
primary_use_case: To prevent the installation or use of the 'MAX' application on an Android device by making it appear non-functional or by blocking its setup.
cover_image_prompt: A digital illustration of a person holding a remote control, pointing it at a smartphone screen that displays a broken 'MAX' app icon. The smartphone screen is surrounded by a subtle digital barrier, preventing a new 'MAX' app icon from being installed. In the background, a small, stylized 'scam-max-disabler' logo is visible on a minimalist desk. The overall mood is one of control and prevention, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The style should be 3D isometric illustration with clear, bold colors and subtle glowing effects around the barrier and broken icon.
